Package skywaysolutions.app.database

Interface IDB_Connector

All Known Implementing Classes:
DB_Connector
public interface IDB_Connector
Provides an Interface for using a database connection.
Author:
Alfred Manville

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    close()
    Closes the contained connection.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      Connection connect(String hostPortCombination, String databaseName, String username, String password) throws CheckedException
      Connects to a database on the specified host port combinations and database name with the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      hostPortCombination - The host:port combination (host:port, failoverHost:port...).
      databaseName - The name of the database.
      username - The username to authenticate as.
      password - The password to authenticate as.
      Returns:
      The database connection.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - A connection failure occurs.

    • getStatement

      PreparedStatement getStatement(String sqlTemplate) throws CheckedException
      Gets a prepared statement for the provided SQL template string. DO NOT forget to use Statement.close() when finished.
      Parameters:
      sqlTemplate - The SQL template string.
      Returns:
      The prepared statement for parameterization and execution.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The statement creation failed.

    • close

      void close() throws CheckedException
      Closes the contained connection.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The closing of a connection has failed.

    • getTableList

      List<String> getTableList(boolean update) throws CheckedException
      Gets a list of table names.
      Parameters:
      update - Update the list with a query.
      Returns:
      The list of table names.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The table names could not be obtained.

    • getDatabaseName

      String getDatabaseName() throws CheckedException
      Gets the database name.
      Returns:
      The database name.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The database name could not be obtained.
